title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Mix eggs and cheese. Fry bacon. Combine everything and season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken. Grill it. Make sauce with tomato, cream, and spices. Combine and simmer.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: An authentic Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.
instructions: Spread sauce on dough. Add cheese and bake. Top with basil and olive oil.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Traditional Mexican tacos filled with spiced beef, salsa, and cheese.
instructions: Cook beef with spices. Fill tortillas with beef, salsa, cheese, and lettuce.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: A quick and healthy snack made with mashed avocados, olive oil, salt, and pepper on toasted bread.
instructions: Mash avocado. Spread on toasted bread. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A green salad of romaine lettuce and croutons dressed with lemon juice, olive oil, and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Toss lettuce with croutons, dressing, and parmesan. Serve chilled.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A medley of fresh vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and ginger. Add soy sauce and serve hot.

title: Banana Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes made with mashed bananas and served with maple syrup.
instructions: Mix mashed bananas with batter. Cook pancakes and serve with syrup.
